Color Palette

Each color from the brand color palette is available as a variable when building Apollo UI with SCSS. Below are all the available shades for each color, including the variable name and value for each.

Primary Colors
$atmosphere
#32b5fc
$atmosphere-lighter
#C9ECFE
$atmosphere-light
#95DAFD
$atmosphere-dark
#2886BA
$atmosphere-darker
#1B597D
$atmosphere-darkest
#134968
$blue
#2975e9
$blue-lighter
#C4DAF7
$blue-light
#8EB7F4
$blue-dark
#1E54A8
$blue-darker
#143770
$blue-darkest
#072249
$teal
#3ed6cf
$teal-lighter
#CEF5F6
$teal-light
#9EECE8
$teal-dark
#339E99
$teal-darker
#1E6766
$teal-darkest
#124948
